CustomersDashboardPage.title: Welcome to your Dashboard
CustomersDashboardPage.welcomeMessage: Here you can manage your bookings, view your profile, and more.
CustomersDashboardPage.newBookingDesc: Book from our wide range of home services anytime.
CustomersDashboardPage.offer1Desc: Get your home sparkling clean for the festive season.

IndexPage.benefitConvenienceDesc: Book a slot at your convenience and our professionals will be there on time.
IndexPage.benefitPricingDesc: No hidden charges. All prices are transparent and fair.
IndexPage.benefitProfessionalsDesc: Trusted, trained, and background-verified service experts.
IndexPage.benefitQualityDesc: We use high-quality products and provide a service warranty.
IndexPage.card1Alt: A person cleaning a modern kitchen.
IndexPage.card1Title: Professional kitchen and bathroom cleaning services.
IndexPage.card2Alt: A technician repairing a washing machine.
IndexPage.card2Title: Expert pest control and appliance repair services.
IndexPage.card3Alt: A person using a drill for home repairs.
IndexPage.card3Title: Reliable home repair and installation solutions.
IndexPage.downloadAppSubtitle: Get exclusive access to our wide range of home services and offers.
IndexPage.faq1Answer: We offer a wide range of services including home cleaning, pest control, appliance repair, plumbing, electrical, carpentry, and more.
IndexPage.faq1Question: What kind of home services do you provide?
IndexPage.faq2Answer: You can easily book any service through our website or mobile app. Just select your service, choose a time slot, and confirm.
IndexPage.faq2Question: How do I book a service?
IndexPage.faq3Answer: Yes, all our service professionals go through a rigorous background verification process and are highly trained to ensure your safety and satisfaction.
IndexPage.faq4Answer: Your satisfaction is our priority. We offer a service warranty and will re-work the service for free if you are not happy with the quality.
IndexPage.faq4Question: What if I'm not satisfied with the service?
IndexPage.forgotPasswordSubtitle: Enter your phone number to receive a verification code.
IndexPage.offer1Desc: Get your home sparkling clean for the festive season.
IndexPage.offer3Desc: First-time user? Get a special discount on your first booking.
IndexPage.offer4Desc: Get 10% off on all appliance and home repair services.
IndexPage.offer5Desc: Book our annual pest control plan and get the first service free.
IndexPage.offer6Desc: Give your home a fresh new look with our professional painting services.
IndexPage.offersSubtitle: Exclusive deals and discounts to make our services even more affordable.
IndexPage.howItWorksSubtitle: Get any home service in 4 easy steps
IndexPage.step1Desc: Select the service you need from our wide range of options.
IndexPage.step2Desc: Pick a time slot that is convenient for you.
IndexPage.step3Desc: Get live updates and track your professional's arrival.
IndexPage.step4Desc: Make a secure payment online only after the service is complete.
IndexPage.subtitle: From cleaning and pest control to repairs and installations, we've got your home covered.
IndexPage.testimonial1Text: The deep cleaning service was fantastic! My home has never been this clean. The team was punctual and very thorough.
IndexPage.testimonial2Text: Had a plumbing issue that was fixed within hours of booking. Super impressed with the quick and professional service.
IndexPage.title: Total Home Care, One Tap Away
